com.compendium.core.db
Class DBCode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBCode

public class DBCode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBCode class serves as the interface layer between the RCode objects and the Code table in the database.

Field Summary

          SQL statement to delete a Code with the given CodeID.

Method Detail

insert

public static Code insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                          java.lang.String sNodeID,
                          java.lang.String sCodeID,
                          java.lang.String sAuthor,
                          java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                          java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                          java.lang.String sName,
                          java.lang.String sDescription,
                          java.lang.String sBehavior)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new code in the database and associates it with the given NodeID if not null.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sNodeID, - the id of the node to add this code to if not null.
sCodeID, - the id of the new code.
sAuthor, - the author who created this code.
dCreationDate - java.util.Date, the creation date of the code
dModificationDate - java.util.Date, the last modification date for the code (same as creation).
sName, - the name of the new code.
sDescription, - the description for the new code.
sBehavior, - the behavior for the new code.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
